i1.blurb: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vel'Koz's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] ''Deconstruct'' enemies every time they are hit, stacking up to 3 times. ''Deconstruction'' stacks last for 7 seconds. '''Vel'Koz's''' basic attacks refresh ''Deconstruction'' stacks' duration on-hit.
Three ''Deconstruction'' stacks are consumed to deal {{pp|33 to 169}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} and briefly grant {{tip|sight}} of the enemy.
i1.name: Organic Deconstruction

q1.blurb: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
description: {{sbc|First Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' fires an energy bolt in a line, stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration.

After a {{fd|0.25}} seconds delay, and while the bolt is in the air, '''Vel'Koz''' can reactivate ''Plasma Fission'' and automatically does so upon reaching maximum [[range]] or upon hitting an enemy unit.
{{sbc|Second Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' splits the energy bolt in two, each firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the original bolt's trajectory as well as copying its effects.
leveling: {{st|Mana Restored On-Kill|{{as|{{ap|20 to 30}}|mana}}|Maximum Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|20*3 to 30*3}}|mana}}}}
q1.name: Plasma Fission
notes: * An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a spell shield.
* There is a short delay before ''Plasma Fission'' can be reactivated, making the primary bolt travel ~500 units before it can be split.

* If one considers the primary and each secondary bolt as a triangle's legs, and by use of the {{w|Pythagorean theorem}}, ''Plasma Fission's'' would travel ~1521 units diagonally (hypotenuse on each side).

w1.blurb: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vel'Koz''' stores a charge of ''Void Rift'' periodically, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and leaving behind a trail. After a {{fd|0.25}} seconds delay, the entire trail detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies standing upon it.
leveling:
{{st|Initial Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 110}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Detonation Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|30+45 to 110+165}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Void Rift
notes: * Each damage portions applies an {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz}} stack.
* It is not possible to have more than one ''Void Rift'' active at a time.
* '''Vel'Koz''' can cast ''Void Rift'' while moving but not while attacking.
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will not destroy the trail created by ''Void Rift'' before being blocked.

e1.blurb: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Vel'Koz''' hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after {{fd|0.55}} seconds, briefly providing {{tip|sight}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|suspension|suspending}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. Enemies close to '''Vel'Koz''' at the time of impact are also slightly {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} in the direction of the cast.
e1.name: Tectonic Disruption
notes: * ''Tectonic Disruption's'' suspension is affected by {{ii|Mercury's Treads|Tenacity}} and can be removed ({{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{si|Cleanse}}, {{ai|Remove Scurvy|Gangplank}}).
* The required proximity for displacement is relative to '''Vel'Koz's''' position when casting and not his current one.
* There is a brief ~{{fd|0.1}} second cast time before the projectile begins to travel.
* Although considered to be a projectile, {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block ''Tectonic Disruption'', but will not destroy it. This is most likely a bug.

r1.blurb: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Researched:}} {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstructing}} enemy champions marks them as ''{{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz}}'' for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and ability damage will refresh this duration.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' [[channel]]s for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and projects an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the cursor. Reactivating ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' immediately ends its effects.

The ray deals {{as|magic damage}} in {{fd|0.25}} seconds intervals to enemies caught in its wake, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20% for 1 second. {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}} is applied every {{fd|0.7}} seconds to enemies hit, up to 3 stacks. {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} enemies take {{as|true damage}} instead.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|45 to 80}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|45*10 to 80*10}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
notes: * ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' trajectory updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of '''Vel'Koz''' to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
* '''Vel'Koz''' will only start {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researching''}} enemies once ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' has been learned.
* If an enemy champion becomes {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} during ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' channel, it will take true damage for the remainder of the channel.
* Enemies standing inside '''Vel'Koz's''' hitbox during ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' will take damage from it, regardless of '''Vel'Koz's''' orientation.
